texts.en:
There are 17 members who have joined this group that is also participating in the poverty elimination program. By taking the survey of 50 indicators, the members are able to become familiar with their life situations and what they need to do to improve.

One member who stands out is Sra. Primitiva. She is a hardworking and self-sacrificing woman. Despite the many setbacks that she has endured, she is motivated to press forward because of them. Primitiva does want her family to go through the same experience. She sells food that she prepares herself and says that her customers enjoy her dishes tremendously.

Primitiva is requesting a loan so that she can invest in her food business. She needs to buy vegetables, condiments, meat, and other supplies so that she can continue her sales and improve each day. All of the members appreciate the opportunity they have received, which will help them improve their living conditions.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, condiments, meat, and other supplies.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary has a retail shop and has been running this business for six years. She is 40 years old, married and together with her spouse they have been blessed with five children.

She will use this loan to pay school fees for her child. She will use the anticipated profits to boost her business.

This is her sixth loan term from VisionFund Kenya and she paid her previous loans successfully. In the future she hopes to have a prosperous business and be successful.

loans.use: To pay school fees for her children.

loans.name: Anne

texts.en:
Hello, lenders! Meet Anne, a youthful 48-year-old shosho (old mum), a wise farmer whom neighbors and fellow farmers respect as a mentor. She farms a small plot of land in the green, lush hills of Kitale, in the Rift valley region of Kenya. Anne is happily married and together with her husband, blessed with four lovely children. For the past 19 years she has been involved in mixed farming and her primary source of income has been growing maize, cabbage, tomatoes and also, she keeps dairy cows. Anne has been able to provide nutritious food for her family. Although she has been making profits selling a variety of food crops, she is faced with a challenge of timely delivery of the produce to the market. This challenge has not made her give up. “I have to do something for my family,“ she said.

Anne mobilized other women in her village and joined Juhudi Kilimo, which is a microfinance institution that assists aspiring women like her. She is requesting a loan from Juhudi Kilimo via Kiva lenders to buy a motorbike. Anne is from a remote village that has poor feeder roads and transporting her produce to the market has been a challenge; hence she has suffered so many losses. Perishable products such as milk, vegetables and tomatoes require timely delivery to the market if you are to fetch a high price, and through this loan Anne is going to achieve her dream and goals.

Accessing a financial solution for women in Kenya is an uphill battle but Anne feels relieved to know that there are institutions such as Juhudi Kilimo via Kiva that help out women so that they can gain respect and equality among their male counterparts. The benefits of this loan are astronomical because Anne will never suffer losses due to delay in delivery of produce to the market and also she will increase her sales volume because she will be able to transport more goods to the market; hence an increased income level. Ann is a woman who is making a change for herself and for others in the community because she intends to employ someone who will be riding the motorbike and helping with farm work. With your loan, Anne will improve her living conditions and assure her children and grandchildren to come of a secure future.

loans.use: To buy a motorbike to transport produce to market

loans.name: Bahrom

texts.ru:
Бахром мужчина 35 лет , женат отец четверых детей.Он окончил девять классов школы и в возрасте 14 лет начал работать , чтобы помогать родителям.Полдня он подрабатывал рабочим на стройке у соседей,остальное время пас скот и выращивал урожай. После женитьбы Бахром продолжил заниматься земледелием.Сейчас он выращивает картошку,морковь,огурцы,помидоры. Так же на его участке земли имеется несколько деревьев фруктов. Весь собранный урожай он отвозит на рынок и продает. Денег от продажи урожая не хватает,поэтому он еще подрабатывает ночным таксистом.
Бахром  планирует купить семена ,но ему не  хватает денег.Поэтому он обратился в МДО Арванд за финансовой поддержкой.Бахром выражает свою благодарность МДО Арванд за то,что в любые моменты жизни МДО Арванд подает руку помощи.
texts.en:
Bahrom is 35 years old, married, and the father of four children.  Bahrom finished the 9th grade and started working at age 14 in order to help his parents.  He worked half the day for his neighbors as a construction laborer.  The rest of the time he tended cattle and worked as a farm hand.  Bahrom continued farming after his marriage.  He currently grows potatoes, carrots, cucumbers, and tomatoes.  He also has several fruit trees.  He sells his entire harvest at the market.  Since his income from farming isn't enough, he also works nights as a taxi driver.  

Bahrom is planning to buy seed but he doesn't have enough money, so he applied to MDO Arvand for financial support.  Bahrom would like to thank MDO Arvand for being ready to lend a helping hand at any moment.

loans.use: to buy seed

loans.name: Benkadi Group

texts.fr:
Les cinq  membres du groupe BENKADI sont constitués essentiellement de femmes mariées avec une moyenne d’âge de 47 ans, et ont en moyenne  5 enfants. Elles vivent la plupart dans les  familles polygame au quartier Bougoula ville un des quartiers périphérique de la ville de Sikasso 3ème  région administrative du Mali. 
Elles sont à leur onzième prêt à travers le groupe qui évolue avec l’institution de micro finance Soro Yiriwaso, dans le souci de satisfaire le besoin de leur clientèle.
Mme Mariam fait le commerce de pagne dans ce groupe de femmes, elle est assise à l’extrême droite sur la photo. Elle compte acheter avec son prêt 30 pagnes qu’elle revend au comptant à une clientèle constituée de femmes et d’homme. 
Elle  envisage réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 35 000 francs CFA dont une partie est  utilisée  pour payer le prêt et son interêt et l’autre pour son épargne. Elle ambitionne d’augmenter son chiffre d’affaire pour mieux satisfaire sa clientèle.
texts.en:
The five members in the Benkadi group are for the most part married women, who on average are 47 years old with five children. Most of them live in polygamous families in Bougoula Ville, one of the peripheral areas of the city of Sikasso, in the third administrative region of Mali.

They are on their eleventh group loan, having joined the Soro Yiriwaso micro-finance institution to satisfy their customers' needs.

In this group of women Mariam is a trader of pagnes (colorful West-African fabric). She is sitting on the far right in the photo. She intends to use her loan to buy 30 lengths of pagnes she resells for cash to a clientele consisting of women and men.

She expects average monthly profits of 35,000 CFA francs, which will be used to pay off the loan and its interest; the remainder will be put into savings. She aims to increase her turnover and better satisfy her customers.

loans.use: buy pagnes (colorful West-African fabric)

loans.name: Dilorom

texts.ru:
Дилором замужняя девушка в возрасте 24 лет. Ее муж, как и многие граждане Таджикистана, находиться за приделами страны на заработках. Она живет с трехлетней девочкой на районе Дж.Руми. Дилором дома работает портнихой, принимает заказы на шитье. 
  Для Дилором сейчас черная полоса в жизни. Ее дочка болеет и ей срочно надо купить лекарство. У Дилором недостаточно денег для надобных медикаментов. Она видит выход из положения только в получении кредита. Помогите Дилором купить лекарства для своей трехлетней девочки.
texts.en: Dilorom is a married 24-year-old woman. Her husband, just like many Tajikistan citizens, works outside of the country. She lives with her three-year daughter in the J. Rumy district. Dilorom works at home as a seamstress, working on sewing orders. This is a dark time in Dilorom's life. Her daughter is sick and she urgently need to buy medication for her. Dilorom does not have enough money for the necessary medications. She sees obtaining a loan as the only solution for this situation. Please help Dilorom buy medications for her three-year-old daughter.

loans.use: to buy medications for her three-year-old daughter

loans.name: Halima

texts.en: Halima is a maize farmer and a member of Babban Gona. Halima joined Babban Gona primarily to create a better future for her children: Cicilia, Atara and Mathew. Before she became a Babban Gona member, Halima would have had to sell her maize for low prices soon after harvest to meet her immediate cash needs for items such as food and clothing. With this loan and Babban Gona’s support, Halima can now store her maize at harvest time and sell it a few months later for up to 40% higher than the market price at harvest. When asked, Halima spoke of her ambition to use the additional income to educate her children, eventually hoping to ensure her children are educated and have professional jobs.

loans.use: To pay for her children's school fees and uniforms, thereby eliminating pressure to sell corn for low prices at harvest.

loans.name: Ismete

texts.en:
In this photograph are Ismete and Sulejman, her husband, and they have two grown up children. They live in a little town in northern Albania and are in their early years of retirement. Thus, they receive some pension. Their town used to be an industrial one under the communist era; it had plants for producing wheat flour, pesticides etc.  Very many people from the northern region found employment in this town, like Ismete and Sulejman. These people’s lives were better off back then, due to the fact that they were living the city life and did not face the harsh rural living of that era, as they said.
Ismete is seeking your financial help to cover a surgery expense that she has been scheduled to have as early as next month.

loans.use: to pay for a surgery she has been scheduled for as early as next month

loans.name: Luz Stella

texts.es:
Luz es una mujer pujante, servicial y trabajadora, a sus 54 años de edad, es separada y madre de 1 hijo al que ha sacado adelante con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación.

Desde hace 14 años se desempeña en el campo de la confección, prestando el servicio de confección a terceros y a clientes directos, el oficio lo aprendió a través de clases y trabaja con 2 empleados todos los días, así genera los recursos suficientes para apoyar a su esposo con la carga económica del hogar, su especialidad es la fabricación de lencería.

Actualmente se motiva a solicitar el crédito para comprar una maquina fileteadora y una maquina plana, esto le permitirá mejorar su capacidad de producción y podrá ofrecer dos empleos y así cumplir con la entrega oportuna de los pedidos que tiene pendientes, logrando fidelizar a sus clientes actuales.

Luz manifiesta que desea continuar realizando su labor con mucho empeño, pues quiere ampliar su negocio y además garantizar una estabilidad económica para dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Luz is a powerful, helpful and hardworking woman. At 54-years-old, she is separated and the mother of one son who she's raised with much effort and dedication.

For 14 years, she's worked in the clothing field, providing sewing services to third parties and direct customers. She learned this trade through classes and works with two employees everyday, generating enough resources to support her husband with household expenses. Her speciality is making lingerie.

Currently, she was motivated to seek a loan to buy an overlock sewing machine and a sewing machine. This will allow her to increase her production capacity and be able to provide two jobs, thus achieving timely delivery of pending ordered and achieving loyalty among existing customers.

Luz says she wants to continue doing her job and working very hard, as she wants to grow her business and also guarantee economic stability to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy an overlock sewing machine and sewing machine.

loans.name: Isah

texts.en: Isah is a maize farmer from Kuradawa village in Kaduna state. Before he became a Babban Gona member, Isah would have had to sell his maize for low prices soon after harvest, to meet his immediate cash needs. With this loan and Babban Gona’s support, Isah can now store his maize at harvest time and sell it a few months later for up to 40% higher than the market price at harvest. Isah, like other members of Babban Gona, intends to use the extra income to provide food and clothing for his family, and hopes to become the most profitable farmer in his community.

loans.use: To buy food and clothing, thereby eliminating the pressure to sell corn for low prices at harvest.

loans.name: Titus

texts.en:
Titus is a maize farmer from Kuradawa village in Kaduna state. Before he became a Babban Gona member, Titus would have had to sell his maize for low prices soon after harvest to cater for his immediate cash needs. With this loan and Babban Gona’s support, Titus can now store his maize at harvest time and sell it a few months later for up to 40% higher than the market price at harvest. 

Titus, like other members of Babban Gona, intends to use the extra income to provide food and clothing for his family, and hopes to become the most profitable farmer in his community.

loans.use: to buy food and clothing, thereby eliminating pressure to sell corn for low prices at harvest.

loans.name: Ilda Gladis

texts.es:
Ilda es una persona muy trabajadora que gracias a su esfuerzo diario ha logrado sacar adelante a su hijo brindándole una educación de buena calidad.
Ilda vive en unión libre con su pareja y desde hace mucho tiempo comenzó a vender productos de uso personal a través de catalogo, con gran esfuerzo a superado muchos problemas que se le han presentado.

Actualmente Ilda tiene unos muy buenos pedidos por parte de sus clientes y debido a que no cuenta con un gran capital busca un préstamo para comprar productos de uso personal y responder a los grandes pedidos que tiene de sus clientes.

Su mayor sueño es salir adelante con su negocio y desde este poder ofrecerles a su hijo una buena calidad de vida y una mejor estabilidad económica, sabe que de la mano de Interactuar podrá lograrlo.
texts.en:
Ilda is a very hardworking person. Thanks to her daily effort, she's been able to bring up her son, giving him a high-quality education. Ilda lives with her partner and began selling personal care products through a catalog some time ago. With much effort, she's overcome many problems the work has presented.

Right now, Ilda has several very good orders from her customers. Due to the fact that she doesn't have a lot of capital, she's seeking a loan to buy personal use products and fill the large orders her customers have.

Her biggest dream is to get ahead with her business and through this, be able to offer her son a good quality of life and better economic stability. She knows that she can achieve this with a hand from Interactuar.

loans.use: to buy personal care products.

loans.name: Samwel

texts.en:
Samuel has a butcher shop in Nairobi town and has been running this business for 13 years. He is 53 years old, married and together with his spouse, has been blessed with five children. 

He will use this loan to expand his business by buying more stock of meat to sell and a weighing machine. He will use the anticipated profits to expand his wife’s business. 

This is his fourth loan term from VisionFund Kenya and he paid all his previous loans successfully. In the future, he hopes to be successful in his business and educate his children.

loans.use: To buy a weighing machine and more stock of meat to sell.

loans.name: Leticia Del Carmen

texts.es:
Leticia, necesita de un nuevo crédito para poder comprar harinas, levaduras, leche, huevos, manteca y otros ingredientes para la elaboración de pan, pues desea cubrir las nuevas demandas que hacen los clientes de su producto y mantener la fuente de ingresos para salir adelante con su familia.
El crédito anterior ha sido una herramienta que Leticia ha utilizado para aumentar la productividad y calidad de su panadería, comenta que sus nuevos ingresos le dan oportunidad de cumplir con todos sus compromisos. Su familia mantiene el mismo número de miembros.
texts.en: Leticia is in need of another loan to be able to purchase flour, yeast, milk, eggs, lard and other ingredients to bake bread, since she wants to meet the new demands for her product by her customers and maintain her revenue stream to make headway for her family. The previous loan has been a tool Leticia has used to increase her productivity and improve the quality of her breads. She says that her new revenue has given her the opportunity to fulfill all of her promises. Her family remains the same size.

loans.use: to purchase flour, yeast, milk, eggs, lard and other ingredients to bake bread.

loans.name: Benkadi Group

texts.fr:
Les cinq  quatre membres du groupe BENKADI sont des femmes mariées avec une moyenne d’âge de 35 ans, et ont en moyenne 3 enfants. Elles vivent la plupart dans des familles traditionnelle à Macourani un des quartiers populaire de la ville de Sikasso, 3ème région administrative du Mali. 
Elles sont à leur premier prêt solidaire avec l’institution de micro finance Soro Yiriwaso afin de satisfaire le besoin de leur clientèle.
Madame Anchata debout en deuxième position de la gauche vers la droite sur la photo fait le commerce de condiment  dans ce groupe. Elle compte acheter avec son prêt 5 paquets de 30 unités de cube Maggi, du soumbala ainsi que du poivre. Elle s’approvisionne au grand marché. Sollicitée par sa clientèle composée principalement de femme à travers  la qualité de ses produits, elle fait ces ventes au comptant ainsi qu’à crédit chez elle et au grand marché. 
 Elle  envisage réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 19 500 francs CFA dont une partie est  utilisée  pour payer le prêt ainsi que  son intérêt et l’autre pour son épargne.
texts.en:
The five members in the Benkadi group are married women who on average are 35 years old with three children. Most of them live in traditional families in Macourani, one of the populous districts in Sikasso, the third administrative region of Mali.

They are on their first group loan with the Soro Yiriwaso micro-finance institution, seeking to satisfy their customers' needs.

Mrs. Anchata, who is standing in the second position from left to right in the photo, retails condiments in this group. She intends to use her loan to buy five 30-unit packages of Maggi cubes, soumbala (local beverage) and pepper. She resupplies at the main market. 

She is in high demand from mainly women customers due to the quality of her products. She conducts her sales for cash and on credit, from her home and also at the main market.

She expects average monthly profits of 19,500 CFA francs, part of which will serve to pay off the loan and its interest, and the remainder will be put into savings.

loans.use: buy condiments

loans.name: Jose Luis

texts.es:
José, a sus 29 años de edad, es un hombre carismático, activo y servicial. Ser padre de dos hijos, fue el principal motivo para luchar incansablemente día a día, buscando alternativas para ganarse la vida y llevar el sustento a sus hijos. 

Desde hace aproximadamente 10 años, comenzó a comercializar calzado para todo tipo de clientes, de muy buena calidad y a excelentes precios, lo que le permitió darse a conocer en el sector y lograr una buena trayectoria. 

Esto lo impulsa a solicitar el apoyo del crédito para fortalecer sus inventarios, pues comprará calzado al por mayor, así podrá satisfacer la demanda que aumenta en esta temporada navideña, esto le ayudará a mejorar los ingresos que percibe por su labor. 

José manifiesta que su edad no le impide seguir haciendo lo que le apasiona, por ello siempre se propone nuevas metas y entre ellas está el de convertirse en un gran distribuidor de calzado y generar oportunidades de empleo, así podrá mejorar la calidad de vida y el bienestar tanto de su familia, como la de aquellas personas que le ayuden a realizar su labor diaria.

Anímate a prestar al negocio de José!
texts.en:
At 29 years old. José is a charismatic, active and obliging man. Being the father of two children is José's greatest motivation to fight indefatigably every day to look for alternative ways to earn a living and support his children.

Around 10 years ago, José began to produce and sell footwear for all sorts of customers. He produces good quality products at excellent prices, which allowed him to become known in the local area and to take his business along the right path.

José is applying for this loan in order to strengthen his stock. He will use it to buy footwear in bulk. He can then satisfy demand, which will increase during the Christmas season. This will help José to earn a higher income.

José says that his age does not stop him from doing the work that he is passionate about. José always sets himself new targets, including becoming a big footwear wholesaler and generating job opportunities. José would then be able to improve not only his own and his family's well-being but also that of others who would help him in his work.

So why not loan to José's business?

loans.use: to buy footwear in bulk.

loans.name: Edson

texts.es:
Edson es un hombre de 39 años de edad, soltero, sin hijos, y su negocio es la venta de pollo a la broaster.
Él es optimista, de buena actitud, comprometido con su trabajo, responsable y trabajador. Su negocio lo desarrolla en la zona de ‘cruce Villa Adela’ un lugar céntrico, caracterizado por conectar a varias zonas de la ciudad mediante el transporte público, desde este lugar se puede conseguir transporte a zonas alejadas de la ciudad, de clima frío y seco con una temperatura que varía durante el día entre 4-12 grados centígrados durante todo el año y a una altura de 3800 metros sobre el nivel del mar.
Edson es de tez morena, baja estatura, cabello negro corto, usa lentes de aumento, su lengua materna es el Aymará y habla español por el comercio y por cultura general. Su vida la comparte con sus padres que son de edad avanzada y él se encarga de los gastos, viven en una casa propia construida de ladrillo que cuenta agua potable, electricidad, gas domiciliario y alcantarillado. Su negocio es la venta de pollo a la broaster. Trabajo que realiza al medio día y por la noche de lunes a domingo, el resto del tiempo se encarga de la preparación del pollo y la compra de insumos de cocina como pollo, aceite, especias y otros. “la necesidad por ayudar a mis padres me llevó a emprender mi negocio, con esto pago los gastos del hogar…” comenta. Su sueño es tener un restaurante más grande. Él desea invertir en su negocio mediante la compra de insumos de cocina como; pollo por mayor, aceite, especias y otros, para contar con material de trabajo constante durante la época alta de las fiestas navideñas. Esta es la 1 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 1 año que viene realizando esta actividad. 
Es por esos motivos que Edson solicita un préstamo para la compra de insumos de cocina para la elaboración de pollos a la broaster.
texts.en:
Edson is a 39-year-old man who is single and has no children. His business involves selling fried chicken.

Edson has a good attitude and is committed to his work. He is also optimistic, responsible, and hardworking. His business was started in the District of Cruce Villa Adela, which is a central area known for connecting several parts of the city through its public transportation system. This area also provides transportation to places outside of the city. The weather is cold and dry throughout the year, with a temperature that fluctuates each day between 4 and 12 degrees centigrade. This area lies 3,800 meters above sea level.

Edson has a dark complexion, short stature, short black hair, and wears glasses. His native language is Aymará, but he speaks Spanish in order to conduct business and to integrate himself into the general culture. He shares his life with his elderly parents, so he is in charge of the expenses. They live in a brick house that they own and it receives running water, electricity, natural gas, and sewage services. His business involves selling fried chicken. Edson works from noon to night, Monday through Sunday. The rest of his time is spent preparing the chicken and buying cooking supplies such as chicken, oil, spices, and other ingredients. “Needing to help my parents is what led me to start my business. This allows me to pay for the household expenses,” says Edson. His dream is to have a really large restaurant. He wants to invest in his business by purchasing cooking supplies such as chicken in bulk, oil, spices, and other ingredients so that he will have a constant inventory throughout the busy Christmas season. This is his first loan cycle with Emprender. Edson has been in this business for one year.

For the reasons previously mentioned, Edson is requesting a loan in order to buy cooking supplies for making fried chicken.

loans.use: to buy cooking supplies for making fried chicken.

loans.name: Fatos

texts.en:
Fatos is 29 years old and is very hardworking. He still lives with his family, but he is engaged and hoping to be able to start his own family soon. Although he works in the kitchen of a small restaurant, it is with a low salary, not enough to be able to start his own family and provide adequately for them. He has always been thinking of ways to start his own business and increase his income, but has never had enough money. 

Now, he is very happy that he has found this opportunity through KosInvest and is requesting assistance to reach his dreams. His plan is to start a business planting fruits, such as apples and pears. He has always liked the idea of working in agriculture and is familiar with the business concept. He is requesting a loan in order to pay for the water irrigation and wells for the water. He is very optimistic that his business will succeed and is very happy for the chance. He is very grateful for the lenders and their support.

loans.use: to pay for the water irrigation and wells for the water to start a business planting fruits, such as apples and pears

loans.name: Xhevdet

texts.en: Xhevdet, at age 29, is the father of two children. In order to earn a living, he works very hard, from early morning until late, doing construction work for low wages. He also keeps a cow, in order to save on dairy costs for his family, but is now requesting a loan to purchase another milk cow so that he can sell the milk and other dairy products for additional income. As his wife is currently a housewife and stay-at-home mother, she will be assisting him with raising the cows and collecting and making the dairy products while he is working. Xhevdet is very optimistic that he will be able to earn money through this loan, eventually expand his farm and add even more cows to be able to sell to larger companies. He is very grateful for this opportunity and promises to pay on time.

loans.use: to purchase another milk cow so that he can sell the milk and other dairy products for additional income

loans.name: Salamatu

texts.en: Salamatu is a maize farmer from Kwankwani village in Kaduna state. Before she became a Babban Gona member, Salamatu would have had to sell her maize for low prices soon after harvest, to meet her immediate cash needs. With this loan and Babban Gona’s support, Salamatu can now store her maize at harvest time and sell it a few months later for up to 40% higher than the market price at harvest. Salamatu, like other members of Babban Gona, intends to use the extra income to provide food and clothing for her family, and hopes to become the most profitable farmer in her community.

loans.use: To buy food and clothing, thereby eliminating pressure to sell corn for low prices at harvest.

loans.name: Mujeres De Trinidad Group

texts.es:
Este grupo se llama Mujeres de Trinidad, forma parte del programa de eliminación de la pobreza, donde todas están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de la pobreza para poder mejorar la vida de cada una.
Leonidas es parte de este grupo, es una mujer muy trabajadora que está luchando y creciendo poco a poco por medio de su esfuerzo. Ella tiene una despensa en la que trabaja todos los días desde muy tempranas horas del día, hasta muy tarde, comenta que empezó con un pequeño negocio, pero que se fue abriendo camino.
Pide este préstamo para la compra de frutas, verduras, carne, panificados, y demás, de manera a poder surtir su despensa y seguir ofreciendo a sus clientes todo lo que necesitan.
texts.en:
This group named “Mujeres de Trinidad” (Women of Trinidad) is participating in the poverty elimination program. All of the members have taken the poverty elimination survey so that each of them can improve their lives.

Leonidas is part of this group. She is a hardworking woman who is striving and growing gradually through her efforts. Leonidas has a food pantry where she works every day, beginning in the early morning hours. She continues until late into the afternoon. Leonidas says that she started out with a small business, but now she is making headway.

She is requesting a loan in order to buy fruits, vegetables, meat, baked goods, and other products so that she can restock her food pantry. As a result, she can continue offering her customers everything they need.

loans.use: to buy fruits, vegetables, meat, baked goods, and other products so that she can restock her shop.

loans.name: Matluba

texts.ru:
Матлуба 44-летняя жительница города Душанбе. У нее нет высшего образования, она работает на фабрике, а последние 3,5 года еще и занимается шитьем. Матлуба берет заказы на пошив женских платьев у себя на дому. В данный момент ее швейная деятельность продвигается хорошо, она кроме заказов, еще и берет учениц для обучения их кройке и шитью. 
Матлуба замужем, у нее трое детей. Сыновьям по 25 и 13 лет, а дочери 9 лет. Муж и старший сын находятся вдали от семьи. Они уехали на заработки в Россию. 
Матлуба сейчас хочет улучшить домашнюю обстановку. У нее в доме нет мебели, чтобы ога могла ставить вещи по порядку. Она давно мечтает купить мебель, но для этого никак не может накопить сбережение. Поэтому Матлуба решила получить кредит. До прихода праздника Нового года она хочет красиво обставить свой дом и создать хорошие условия для своей семьи. Матлуба надеется, что ее мечта сбудется благодаря Вашей поддержке.
texts.en:
Matluba is a 44-year-old resident of the city of Dushanbe. She does not have a college education, works at a factory and also has been involved in sewing for the past 3.5 years. Matluba accepts orders to sew women's national dresses at home. At the present time, her sewing business is doing well and, besides the orders, she also accepts apprentices to teach them cutting and sewing. 

Matluba is married and has three children. Her sons are 25 and 13 years old, and daughter is 9 years old. Her husband and son are far away from the family. They left to work in Russia. Matluba now wants to improve her home environment. She does not have furniture at home to arrange her things in order. She has been dreaming of buying furniture, but has not been able to save enough money. This is why Matluba decided to obtain a loan. She wants to furnish her house beautifully before the New Year holiday and create good conditions for her family. Matluba hopes that her dream will come true thanks to Your support.

loans.use: to buy furniture in order to improve her home environment

loans.name: Nohora Isabel

texts.es:
Nohora es una persona muy trabajadora que gracias a su esfuerzo diario ha logrado sacar adelante a sus dos hijos brindándoles una educación de buena calidad.
Nohora vive casada con su pareja y desde hace mucho tiempo comenzó a vender productos de uso personal a través de catalogo, con gran esfuerzo a superado muchos problemas que se le han presentado.

Actualmente Nohora tiene unos muy buenos pedidos por parte de sus clientes en esta temporada navideña y debido a que no cuenta con un gran capital busca un préstamo para comprar productos de uso personal y responder a los grandes pedidos que tiene de sus clientes, con el préstamo podrá mejorar su inventario de productos.

Su mayor sueño es salir adelante con su negocio y desde este poder ofrecerles a sus hijos una buena calidad de vida y una mejor estabilidad económica, sabe que de la mano de Interactuar podrá lograrlo.
texts.en:
Nohora is a very hard-working person who, thanks to her daily efforts, has been able to help her children to get ahead by providing them with a good upbringing.

Nohora is married and lives with her husband. A long time ago, Nohora began selling personal products from catalogues and, with a lot of work, has overcome many problems.

Nohora currently has some very good orders from her customers for this Christmas season. As she does not have a lot of capital, Nohora is applying for a loan in order to buy personal products and to fulfill her customers' orders. With this loan, Nohora can increase her stock.

Nohora's dream is to move forward with her business and, consequently, to offer her children a good quality of life and more financial stability. Nohora knows that, with the help of Interactuar, she can do this.

loans.use: to buy personal products.

loans.name: Antolina

texts.es: Antolina de  50 años de edad vive en casa propia con su hijo, ella se dedica a la venta de productos reciclables desde hace varios años, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra salir adelante, ella quiere mejorar su vivienda terminando de construir el cuarto que muestra en al fotografía, pero no tiene de suficiente capital, por eso solicita un crédito para la compra de cemento, ladrillos, arena, hierro, laminas, polines y pago de mano de obra para que ella y su hijo puedan vivir mas cómodos y seguros.
texts.en: Antolina is 50 years old and lives in her own home with her son. She has made a living selling recyclables for a number of years, and she has been able to make headway with what she has earned. She wants to improve her home by finishing construction on the room shown in the photograph, but she doesn't have sufficient capital, which is why she is requesting the loan in order to purchase cement, bricks, sand, iron, tin sheets and beams, and to pay for labor. In this way she and her son can be safer and more comfortable.

loans.use: to purchase cement, bricks, sand, iron, tin sheets and beams, and to pay for labor.

loans.name: Kemajl

texts.en:
Kemal is married and the father of four children. For more than seven years now, in order to earn a living, Kemal has rented out very tall and large ladders for a profit. Customers use the scaffolding in order to paint, façade, repair or construct large buildings or tall structures. He has a lot of demand for his products, and lately, with all of the new construction and repairs in the country, has not been able to satisfy his clients' needs. 

Now, he is requesting a loan in order to purchase more ladders so that he can gain more profit. His ultimate goal is to expand his business into renting more construction tools and selling them as well. He wants to thank all of the lenders for their support.

loans.use: to purchase more scaffolding so that he can gain more profit

loans.name: Donish

texts.ru:
Дониш замужняя женщина в возрасте 60 лет. Она мать пятерых детей. Ее сыновья работают в Российской Федерации. 
 Дониш около 9 лет продвигает деятельность земледелия и животноводства. Большинство жителей (60%) Таджикистана занимаются сельскохозяйственным бизнесом (животноводство, растениеводства). Дониш не смотря на свой возраст активная женщина. Она успевает работать и на земле и на скотном дворе. Сейчас Донишу необходимо обработать посаженый урожай минеральными удобрениями, чтобы получить богатый, качественный и здоровый урожай. Для этого ей надо купить минеральные удобрения, горючего для трактора и оплатить услуги тракториста. Для приобретения всего этого у нее не хватает денежных средств, и она обратилась за кредитом.
texts.en:
Donish is 60 years old and married.  She has five children and her sons all work in the Russian Federation.  For about nine years Donish has been in the farming and animal husbandry business.  Most Tajiks (60%) work in agriculture (animal husbandry, crop production).  In spite of her age, Donish is an active woman.  She manages to both work in the fields and take care of her cattle.

Currently, Donish needs to fertilize her fields so that she will have a bountiful, high-quality, and healthy harvest.  To do this, she needs to buy mineral fertilizers, tractor fuel and to pay the tractor operator.  However, she doesn't have enough money to do all this, so she has applied for a loan.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizers, to hire a tractor and pay for fuel

loans.name: Pavle

texts.en: Pavle wants to thank all of the lenders for their support. With the loan that he received, he was able to purchase the machine needed to assist with planting. He was very satisfied with the loan process and the results, generating more income and being able to continue with his business. He has seen growth in his business and profit and has been able to continue to cut expenses by not having to hire additional help. Now, for the second time, he is requesting a loan in order to purchase new tools for his tractor to continue to enhance his business and make his work even easier. He is very grateful for the continued support and promises to pay on time again.

loans.use: to purchase new tools for his tractor to continue to enhance his business and make his work even easier

loans.name: Francis

texts.en:
Francis has been selling second-hand clothes for the last eight years and it has been profitable. He is 41 years old, married and together with his spouse, has been blessed with four children. 

He will use this loan from VisionFund Kenya to buy more stock of clothes to sell. He will use the anticipated profits to support his family and educate his children. 

This is his third loan term and he has paid his previous loans successfully. His future hope is to expand his business.

loans.use: To buy more stock of clothes to sell.

loans.name: Nancy Carolina

texts.es:
Nancy, vende pupusas y prendas de vestir, es una persona soltera vive un una casa familiar, junto a su madre, el negocio lo fundo hace 4 años, trabaja sola, con las ganancias ha ido teniendo un inventario más surtido y cuenta con la preferencia de sus clientes.
El financiamiento lo utilizara para  comprar prendas de vestir e insumos para la venta de pupusas, como quesillo, aceite, chicharrón, aderezos, etc., teniendo un inventario surtido su negocio tendrá un lugar en el mercado, espera tener clientes satisfechos, una situación económica mejor y reducir las necesidades básicas de su hogar .
Sus aspiraciones ampliar su negocio, seguir ayudando en los gastos familiares y cancelar su deuda.
texts.en: Nancy sells pupusas (stuffed tortillas) and clothes. She is single and lives in her family's home along with her mother. She founded her business four years ago and works alone. With her profits, she has been increasing her inventory to stay on her customers' good graces. She plans to use the loan to purchase clothing as well as ingredients to make pupusas, such as cheese, oil, pork rind, seasoning, etc., in order to keep her business well stocked. Her business will have a place in the market, and she hopes to satisfy her customers, improve her economic situation and have fewer basic needs at home. Her goals are to expand her business, continue helping with family expenses and eliminating her debt.

loans.use: to purchase clothes and ingredients to make pupusas

loans.name: Shakeela

texts.en: Shakeela, age 49, is a married woman. She deals in the business of selling animals. She buys animals (baby goats and calves) at low prices, raises them, and then sells them in the market at higher prices. She makes enough through her business to contribute to the family income. She also sells milk to generate an extra amount of income. Shakeela needs to improve her business to bear her household expenses. For this reason, she contacted Kashf Foundation and availed a Murabaha loan of PKR 30,000 to purchase one more cow to expand her business and income level.

loans.use: to purchase one more cow to expand her business and income level.

loans.name: Saratu

texts.en:
Saratu is a maize farmer and a member of Babban Gona. Saratu joined Babban Gona primarily to create a better future for her children: Mikayya, Alice and Nasara. Before she became a Babban Gona member, Saratu would have had to sell her maize for low prices soon after harvest, to cater for her immediate cash needs such as food and clothing. With this loan and Babban Gona’s support, Saratu can now store her maize at harvest time and sell it a few months later for up to 40% higher than the market price at harvest. 

When asked, Saratu spoke of her ambition to use the additional income to educate her children, eventually hoping to ensure her children are educated and have professional jobs.

loans.use: to pay for her children's school fees and uniforms, thereby eliminating pressure to sell corn for low prices at harvest.

loans.name: Sitorabonu

texts.ru: Ситорабону 31 год. Она замужем за водителя и у них годовалая дочь и трехлетний сын. Ситорабону живет со своей маленькой семьей в районе Рудаки. Ее муж зарабатывает на жизнь перевозкой пассажиров, а сама Ситорабону является портнихой. Она открыла свой швейный бизнес в 2011 году у себя дома. Ситорабону с того времени по сей день приобрела своих постоянных клиентов. Теперь она хотела бы расширить свою деятельность. Для этой цели она просит кредит. Ситорабону планирует купить компьютерную швейную машинку, чтобы ускорить процесс своей работы и дополнительно по заказу делать на платьях вышивки, которые сегодня очень модно. Таким образом Ситорабону увеличит доходность своего дела и улучшит финансовое положение семьи. Она надеется на эту поддержку.
texts.en: Sitorabonu is 31 years old. She is married to a driver and has a one-year-old daughter and a three-year-old son. Sitorabonu lives with her small family in the Rudaki district. Her husband earns a living by transporting passengers, and Sitorabonu is a seamstress. She opened her own sewing business at home in 2011. Since that time, Sitorabonu obtained her own regular clients. Now she wants to expand her business and is requesting a loan for this purpose. Sitorabonu is planning to purchase a computerized sewing machine in order to speed up her work process and additionally make embroideries on dresses, which are now in style. This is how Sitorabonu will increase the profitability of her business and improve her family's financial situation. She hopes for this support.

loans.use: to purchase a computerized sewing machine

loans.name: Ulugbek

texts.ru: Улугбек мужчина 35 лет ,женат молодой отец троих детей. Он мечтал начать свой бизнес, хотел помогать родителям,поэтому в 18 лет начал работать на ферме у соседей.Потом через 3 года ,собрав деньги,он купил несколько голов домашнего скота.Ухаживал за нами,кормил,пас на поле.Ко всему,его жена выращивает овощи и фрукты и продает их на рынке.Деньги полученные от продажи урожая,идут на ежедневные нужды. Сейчас Улугбек уже имеет 15 голов баранов ,которых откармливает и продаёт . Улугбек настоящий семьянин ,он усердно трудится ради светлого будущего своих детей  . В настоящее время он собирается увеличить поголовье своего стада и купить пару голов баранов.Но ему не хватает некоторой суммы денег.Поэтому он обратился в МДО Арванд за финансовой поддержкой.Улугбек надеется,что  Арванд откликнется на его просьбу о помощи и выделит нужную сумму для расширения его бизнеса.
texts.en:
Ulugbek is a young man of 35 years.  He is married and the father of three children.  Dreaming of starting his own business so that he could help his parents, at age 18 Ulugbek started working on his neighbor's farm.  After working there for three years he had saved up some money and bought several head of cattle.  He looked after his cattle, fed and pastured them, and he now has 15 head of sheep which he is fattening up to sell.  Besides all this, his wife raises fruits and vegetables, which she sells at the market.  The money that she earns is used for the family's everyday needs.  

Ulugbek is a real family man and he is working very hard to give his children a bright future.  Currently, he is planning to buy a couple head of livestock to increase the size of his herd, but he still needs a certain amount of money.  To this end, he applied to MDO Arvand for financial support.  Ulugbek is hoping that MDO Arvand will answer his call for help and allocate him the funds necessary to expand his business.

loans.use: to buy livestock

loans.name: Yaneth Dinora

texts.es: Yaneth de 40 años de edad se dedica desde hace varios años a la crianza de pollos y los comercializa en los pueblos aledaños, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos del hogar, Yaneth esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas pollos y asi continuar con la crianza y tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: Yaneth is 40 years old and, for a number of years, has made a living raising chickens, which she sells in the surrounding areas. With profits from sales, Yaneth is able to cover some household costs. Yaneth is applying for a loan in order to buy more chickens, continue with her business, and earn a higher income.

loans.use: to buy more chickens.

loans.name: Gladys

texts.en:
Gladys is 29 years. She is married and together with her spouse, has been blessed with children of a school-going age.

Gladys sells cereals, a business she has done for the last year, earning a monthly income of Kes 10,000. Gladys has requested her second loan with VisionFund Kenya of Kes 22,500, which she will use to add stock of cereals, especially dried maize. She successfully repaid her previous loan.

With the anticipated profits, Gladys will be able to repay her loan and add more stock of cereals.

Her hope and dream for the future is to be able to buy a plot and build. She also wishes to educate her children for life.

loans.use: to add to her stock of cereals, especially dried maize

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: el joven a quien se le ha pixeleado la cara por tener 25 años de edad y vivir en zona de alto riesgo, se dedica desde hace algunos años a la crianza de ganado,comercializa sus productos en los alrededores de la zona, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo ayuda en su casa con los gastos, el joven vive en casa propia con sus padres, el esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de un ternero para continuar con su trabajo y así tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: This young man, pixelated because he is 25 years old and lives in a high-risk area, has, for a number of years, made a living raising cattle. He sells his products in the surrounding areas and, with profits from his work, helps to pay household costs. This borrower lives in his parents' house. He is applying for a loan in order to buy a calf to continue with his work and earn a higher income.

loans.use: to buy a calf.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy trammel nets and make improvements to his boat.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy sweet bread in bulk.

loans.name: Oliver

texts.en: Oliver is a single man. He describes himself to be optimistic. He operates a retail business where he sells charcoal. He has been involved in this business for two years. His business is located in a busy area and his primary customers are regular. He will use the Kes 20,000 loan to buy more stock of charcoal. His business goal is to have a bigger charcoal store within five years. He hopes that in the future, he will improve his living standards. This is his first loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank.

loans.use: buy more stock of charcoal

loans.name: Leah

texts.en:
Leah is 30 years old, married and together with her spouse, has been blessed with two children. She sells cereals and has been in this business for 10 years. Right now, she makes a monthly income of KES 50,000. 

She plans to use this loan to pay school fees for her child. She will use the anticipated profits to repay the loan. 

This is her eighth loan from VisionFund Kenya and she paid her previous loans successfully. Her future hopes are to expand her business and educate her children.

loans.use: To pay school fees for her child.

loans.name: Jose Cirilo

texts.es:
José, tiene como negocio la siembra de granos básicos (maíz, frijol y maicillo) y la crianza de cerdos, de esta manera ha podido solventar los gastos familiares, vive con su esposa, sus hijos y nietos, todos son dependientes, toda su vida se ha dedicado a esté negocio, en ocasiones lo hace con ayuda de mozos, su horario es de 7:00 a.m. a 3:00 p.m., el oficio se lo enseño su padre, las dificultades son que los animales se le pueden enfermar y que por un mal clima su cosecha pueda perderse.
Utilizará el préstamo para poder comprar cerdos y concentrado para alimentarlos y mantenerlos sanos, con lo restante invertirá en la recolección de la cosecha de granos básicos para prepararlos, fortalecerá su negocio y llevara a cabo en el tiempo  justo los trabajos agrícolas, espera mejorar su situación económica para subsistir con su familia.
Sus sueños son administrar muy bien el crédito, continuar luchando por tener en el mercado su negocio y dar un nivel de vida más confortable a su familia.
texts.en:
José has a business sowing basic grains (beans, corn and sorghum) and raising pigs. With this business, José has been able to cover household costs. José lives with his wife, children and grandchildren, all of whom are dependents. Having learned this trade from his father, José has worked in this business all his life though sometimes has assistance from labourers. José works from 7am until 3pm. The difficulty in this business is that José's animals can become ill and that, if the weather is bad, the harvest can be lost.

José will use this loan to buy pigs and feed to keep them healthy; the rest of the loan will be used to invest in bringing in the harvest of basic grains. This loan will strengthen José's business and allow him to carry out the necessary farming work on time. José hopes to improve his financial situation in order to support his family.

José's dreams are to manage this loan well and to continue fighting in order for his business to have a place on the market. In addition, José would like to offer his family a more comfortable life.

loans.use: to buy pigs and feed to keep them healthy; the rest of the loan will be used to invest in bringing in the harvest of basic grains.

loans.name: Rubango Tweyombeke Group

texts.en: Julius is a 39-year-old married man with four children living in Kyenjojo, Uganda.  His business is operating a fresh food stall and he is also involved in agriculture to generate more income. He started the business because there is a lot of demand for products like vegetables. Julius has asked for a loan to buy fresh foods and bananas to sell. He is a member of a group where each member guarantees the others to get a loan.

loans.use: To buy fresh foods and bananas to sell.

loans.name: Juan José

texts.es:
Juan, de 42 años de edad, está acompañado, estudió hasta sexto grado, no continuo porque la escuela estaba a una distancia muy retirada y las comodidades no eran como hoy en día y tiene 4 hijos.

Juan,  tiene 28 años de tener molino en su casa, decidió colocar este negocio, porque él vive en una zona bastante poblada y vio la necesidad de poner un molino.- Junto con su pareja se dedican a esto, el horario de moler es de dos jornadas, una la hace de las 8:00 a.m. a las 11:00 a.m. y por la tarde de 3:00 p.m. hasta las 5:00 p.m.

Juan, necesita el crédito para comprarle fajas al molino; ya que se le han dañado porque en esta época de navidad, tubo bastante actividad y se le dañaron.- Es por eso que hoy se le ha presentado esa emergencia, con esto va a solventar la necesidad y podrá seguir ofreciéndoles este servicio a todos sus clientes,

Juan, es poder seguir prestando este servicio a las personas de su comunidad y tener más molinos para que las personas puedan moler otros tipos de granos como café y harina para los animales.
texts.en:
Juan is 42 years old and has a partner. Juan has a sixth grade education but could not continue any further as the school was very far away and life was not as simple as it is now. Juan has four children.

For 28 years Juan has had a mill in his home. He decided to set up this business as he lives in an area with a high population and saw that there was a need for a mill. Juan works with his wife; they do one shift each per day: one works from 8am until 11am and the other from 3pm until 5pm.

Juan needs this loan in order to buy belts for the mill as the current ones are damaged due to the high amount of work during the Christmas season and urgently need to be replaced. With this loan, Juan can fill this need and continue to offer his services to his customers.

Juan's dream is to continue offering his services to people in the community, and to have more mills so that he can grind other grinds such as coffee, or flour for animals.

loans.use: to buy belts for his mill.

loans.name: Noc

texts.en:
Noc is 52 years old and he is requesting this loan to pay for his daughter’s university fees. She is studying law and is in the second year of her studies. Noc, however has been photographed with Vitore, his wife, because she expressed the desire to be in this photo, according to the loan officer.

Noc and Vitore have five children with the 21-year-old being the oldest and the one who is pursuing the law degree and the 13-year-old being the youngest one.  Livestock and poultry are their activities; currently, they’ve got four pigs and chickens. They had a dairy cow as well, but some thieves stole it from them, and this upset the cow's owners very much. In addition to the above, they own some 4,000 meters of agricultural land where they plant mostly fodder and corn and also grapevines. They sell eggs, piglets, animal feed and a homemade alcohol drink called ‘raki’ locally

Vitore works as a teacher for about $350/month and Noc pays rent for a little bar that he’s been operating for some time now.

loans.use: to pay for his 21-year-old daughter's education fees; she's in the second year of a law degree

loans.name: Boniface

texts.en: Boniface is a married man. He has two children. He describes himself to be committed. He operates a retail business where he sells soft drinks, bread, flour and other items. He has been involved in this business for three years. His business is located in a good area and his primary customers are individuals. He describes his biggest business challenge to be price fluctuation. He will use the Kes 10,000 loan to buy more stock of soft drinks, flour, sugar and other items. His business goal is to have a bigger business within five years. He hopes that in the future, he will be successful in business. This is his second loan with SMEP Microfinance bank. His previous loan was repaid successfully.

loans.use: to buy more stock of soft drinks, flour, sugar and other items

loans.name: Divino Niño Jesus Group

texts.es:
El grupo Divino Niño Jesus es un grupo nuevo que tiene las esperanzas de poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida y las de su familia. Están dentro del programa de eliminación de la pobreza, luchando por poder mejorar.
Integra este grupo la Sra. Wilma, quien es la presidenta, ella se dedica a la venta de ropas, se ha formado una clientela que siempre compra de ella todo lo que vende. Es una mujer muy trabajadora y luchadora que quiere ir mejorando sus condiciones de vida a través de su esfuerzo y trabajo.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar prendas varias para la venta, y con ello ir mejorando cada día mas. Agradece por la oportunidad que está recibiendo de poder seguir trabajando.
texts.en:
“Divino Niño Jesus” is a new group of members who are hopeful of improving their living conditions and those of their families. They are participating in the poverty elimination program and are striving to improve.

Sra. Wilma is part of this group and is also serving as its president. She sells clothes and has formed a clientele who are always wanting to buy everything that she offers. Wilma is a hardworking and determined woman who wants to her improve her living conditions through her effort and work.

She is requesting a loan in order to buy various types of clothes to sell, which will help her to improve with each passing day. Wilma is grateful for the opportunity she has received so that she can keep working.

loans.use: to buy various types of clothes to sell.

loans.name: Imrana

texts.en: Imrana is a maize farmer from the Nassarawa village in Kaduna state. Before he became a Babban Gona member, Imrana would have had to sell his maize for low prices soon after harvest, to cater for his immediate cash needs. With this loan and Babban Gona’s support, Imrana can now store his maize at harvest time and sell it a few months later for up to 40% higher than the market price at harvest. Imrana, like other members of Babban Gona, intends to use the extra income to provide food and clothing for his family, and hopes to become the most profitable farmer in his community.

loans.use: To buy food and clothing, therefore eliminating the pressure to sell corn for low prices at harvest.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy seasonal ornaments and other decorations to resell.
